File List

Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:
adapter.hContains all adapter-related functions exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms
adl.hContains the main functions exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms
adl_defines.hContains all definitions exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms.
Included in ADL SDK
adl_sdk.hContains the definition of the Memory Allocation Callback.
Included in ADL SDK
adl_structures.hThis file contains the structure declarations that are used by the public ADL interfaces for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms.
Included in ADL SDK
appprofiles.hContains all appprofiles-related functions exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms
controller.hContains all controller-related functions exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms
crossdisplay.hDefines CrossDisplay-specific public functions on Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms
display.hContains all Display functions exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms
displaysmanager.hContains all functions related to Display Manager that are exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms
graphics.h
lnx.hContains all Linux-related functions exposed by ADL for Linux; 32bit and 64bit platforms
overdrive5.hContains all Overdrive5-related functions exposed by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms
workstation.hContains all Workstation exposed functions by ADL for Linux and Windows(XP, Vista and Windows 7); 32bit and 64bit platforms
